pages.text: The $(bold)Combust$() command is a complex command that only some Pet Rocks™ can learn.$(br2)Issuing this command will cause your pet rock to begin vibrating rapidly until it bursts into flames.$(br2)Do not worry! This is a perfectly natural phenomenon and does not harm the rock at all.
Holding onto a Pet Rock™ acting out the $(bold)Combust$() command is not recommended as it can result in serious burns.$(br2)You should transfer the rock hand to hand to avoid any negative effects.
